titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize certain disabled former prisoners of war to use Department of Defense commissary stores and post and base exchanges.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S569)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Authorizes use of Department of Defense commissary stores and post exchanges by former prisoners of war who have been honorably separated from service and have a service-connected disability rating of 30 percent or more.
